text.div: CapabilityStatement for File Source actor in the IHE IT Infrastructure Technical Framework Supplement- Non-Patient File Sharing profile (NPFS). This conformance resource is Informative. The Normative content can be found through Non-patient File Sharing (NPFS) Rev. 3.0

title.value: IHE ITI Non-patient File Sharing (NPFS) - File Source (publisher)

description.value: CapabilityStatement for File Source actor in the IHE IT Infrastructure Technical Framework Supplement- Non-Patient File Sharing profile (NPFS). This conformance resource is Informative. The Normative content can be found through http://wiki.ihe.net/index.php/Non-patient_File_Sharing_(NPFS)
